attributes.action: Save East Rural Children's Centres (Eye & Thorney) Peterborough
attributes.additional_details:
We would like Peterborough City Council to rethink their proposals to close 6 Children's Centres across the city & wider area & from removing the open access facility from those they are considering converting into 'hub centres'.
We would like the council to work together with local communities to enable the buildings & facilities to be utilised in a more financially viable way.
